title: I need help deleting pictures. I want to delete from my device, but sometimes I can only archive
content: Hello There!  I am finally freeing up some space in my photos app.  I backed up all of my photos onto my google drive.  I am now selecting most of the photos to delete from the device.  However, it doesn't always give me that choice.  Sometimes when I click the 3 dots it only always me to archive the photos.  I want to delete them from my device.  I would appreciate your help.
